Package com.intellij.util

Class DocumentUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.DocumentUtil

  • public final class DocumentUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Is intended to hold utility methods to use during Document processing.

    • Method Detail

      • executeInBulk

        public static void executeInBulk(Document document,
                                 boolean executeInBulk,
                                 java.lang.Runnable task)
        Ensures that given task is executed when given document is at the given 'in bulk' mode.
        Parameters:
        document - target document
        executeInBulk - true to force given document to be in bulk mode when given task is executed; false to force given document to be not in bulk mode when given task is executed
        task - task to execute
        See Also:
        Document.setInBulkUpdate(boolean)
